title: 820-00281 no video
message:
Arrived with no liquid damage. Customers claims screen just stopped turning on one day. No internal video but external works fine. Do not have a  spare screen to test with. Its never been dropped.

What should be checked first?

title: 820-00281 no video
message:
Possibly flexgate issue.
Testing with known good LCD assembly is the best option.

title: 820-00281 no video
message: New screen ordered. Will update after it arrives

title: 820-00281 no video
message:
New screen arrived and installed. Now have image on the screen but no backlight

PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT 0V  0.50 diode mode

What needs to be checked next?

title: 820-00281 no video
message:
Chinese screen?
Did you get image with original screen before, only missing backlight?

title: 820-00281 no video
message:
Just checked and yes, there is image on original screen as well only missing backlight.

Should U8400 be changed? F8400 is good

title: 820-00281 no video
message: Should be good to test the screens in other machine.

title: 820-00281 no video
message: What else can we try? We do not have other machine like this

title: 820-00281 no video
message:
PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT voltage (screen connected)?
Also check diode mode to ground; w/ and w/o LCD connected.

title: 820-00281 no video
message:
PPVOUT_S0_LCDBKLT  0V with screen connected

diode mode with screen 0.024

diode mode without screen 0.024

title: 820-00281 no video
message:
0.024 is almost short; and result to be on the MLB.
What is the value at L8410?

title: 820-00281 no video
message:
One of C8460-73 should be bad then.
Are many caps there, remove one by one and test each time if diode mode goes high.

Check first if any looks strange; remove that if is the case.

title: 820-00281 no video
message: Solved. C8472 was shorted. thank you
